Interface tripleplay.ui.Scroller.Clippable

Changed Methods
void setPosition(float, float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Sets the translation of the content, based on scroll bar positions.
void setViewArea(float, float) Changed from non-abstract to abstract. Sets the size of the area the content should clip to.
